Title: Data Integrity Nightly Job
Description:
Checksums, schema diffs, drift reports.

**Type:** Automation

**Schedule:** Daily at 02:00 UTC

**Steps:**
1. Pull latest data from all sources
2. Compute checksums for each table
3. Compare against previous day
4. Generate drift report
5. If drift > 0.1%, create Linear ticket
6. Upload report to evidence locker

**Retry:** 3 attempts with exponential backoff
**Fail Action:** Create P1 incident, page on-call

**Rollback:** Not applicable (read-only job)

Title: Benchmark Pipeline Runner
Description:
Parameter grid runs, artifact bundling, reporting.

**Type:** Automation

**Schedule:** Weekly Sunday 00:00 UTC + On-demand

**Steps:**
1. Load parameter configurations
2. Execute grid across all models
3. Collect metrics and artifacts
4. Bundle into versioned ZIP
5. Hash-stamp and upload
6. Update Linear milestone with results

**Retry:** 2 attempts per model
**Fail Action:** Partial results published, ticket for failures

**Rollback:** Revert to previous benchmark set

Title: Backtest Orchestrator
Description:
Sliding windows, embargo logic, failure handling.

**Type:** Automation

**Schedule:** On milestone completion

**Steps:**
1. Validate embargo periods
2. Execute sliding window backtests
3. Compare against thresholds
4. Flag regressions
5. Generate signed report
6. Block Validation state if thresholds missed

**Retry:** 3 attempts on transient errors
**Fail Action:** Block progression, escalate

**Rollback:** Mark milestone as failed, requeue

Title: Key Issuance Service
Description:
Mint soulbound keys, handle retries, audit logging.

**Type:** Automation

**Trigger:** On payment confirmation

**Steps:**
1. Validate payment webhook
2. Generate unique key
3. Stamp with expiry date
4. Associate with member record
5. Enable gated access
6. Log to audit trail

**Retry:** 5 attempts with backoff
**Fail Action:** Hold payment, notify support

**Rollback:** Revoke key, refund payment

Title: Payment Reconciliation Job
Description:
Nightly balance checks, discrepancy handling.

**Type:** Automation

**Schedule:** Daily at 04:00 UTC

**Steps:**
1. Pull transactions from gateway
2. Compare against internal ledger
3. Flag discrepancies
4. Create ticket for each mismatch
5. Mark access pending until cleared

**Retry:** 3 attempts
**Fail Action:** Escalate to finance

**Rollback:** Not applicable

Title: Content Drop Assembler
Description:
Insight packaging, claims checking, delivery.

**Type:** Automation

**Schedule:** Per tier cadence (Weekly/Biweekly)

**Steps:**
1. Pull latest insights
2. Run claims checker
3. Package for each tier
4. Deploy to delivery channels
5. Log coverage stats to Linear
6. Alert on delivery failures

**Retry:** 3 attempts per channel
**Fail Action:** Partial delivery, escalate

**Rollback:** Recall and resend corrected

Title: Auction Settlement Processor
Description:
Identity validation, fund confirmation, ledger posting.

**Type:** Automation

**Trigger:** On auction close

**Steps:**
1. Validate winner identity
2. Confirm funds cleared
3. Post final ledger
4. Trigger key award
5. Generate press release draft
6. Notify stakeholders

**Retry:** 2 attempts on fund verification
**Fail Action:** Reserve winner notified

**Rollback:** Void auction, refund all

Title: Brand Monitoring Service
Description:
Mentions, domain lookups, media flags.

**Type:** Automation

**Schedule:** Every 15 minutes

**Steps:**
1. Query monitoring APIs
2. Filter for relevance
3. Assess threat level
4. Create incident if high
5. Push to security dashboard
6. Inject runbook link

**Retry:** Continuous
**Fail Action:** Fall back to hourly

**Rollback:** Not applicable

Title: Model Evaluation Runner
Description:
Scheduled/on-demand model assessment.

**Type:** Automation

**Schedule:** Daily + On code change

**Steps:**
1. Pull latest model weights
2. Run evaluation suite
3. Compare against baselines
4. Push metrics to dashboard
5. Open Change issue if threshold slips
6. Update Linear with artifacts

**Retry:** 2 attempts
**Fail Action:** Block deployment

**Rollback:** Revert to previous model

Title: Weekly Review Generator
Description:
Auto-create summary issues with metrics.

**Type:** Automation

**Schedule:** Every Monday 09:00 UTC

**Steps:**
1. Aggregate week's metrics
2. Summarize completed issues
3. List blockers
4. Generate weekly review issue
5. Tag stakeholders
6. Schedule meeting reminder

**Retry:** Not applicable
**Fail Action:** Manual creation

**Rollback:** Not applicable
